GUIA 03

EX01A
A)1001 = 00 1001 = 110110
B)1100 = 0000 1100 = 11110011
C)100111 =  100111 = 011000 + 1 = 011001
D)101001 = 0 101001 = 1010110 + 1 = 1010111
E)110001 = 00 110001 = 1001110 + 1 = 11001111

EX02
A)123(4) = 11011 = 0 11011 = 100100
B)5E(16) = 1011110 = 0 1011110 = 10100001
C)231(4) = 101101 = 101101 = 010010 + 1 = 010011
D)517(8) = 101001111 = 1001111 = 0110000 + 1 = 0110001
E)D3(16) = 11010011 = 11010011 = 00101100 + 1 = 00101101

EX03
A)10110 = 01001 = +9
B)110101 = 001010 = +10
C)110011 = 001100 = +12
D)1011001 = 0100110 = 2 + 4+ 32 = +38
E)1011101 = 0100010 = 2+ 32 = +34

EX04
A)10001
B)001,0011
C)102
D)176
E)15E(?)

EX05
A)101101 + 0011 = 100001
B)11,00101
C)101000
D)10000010
E)01(?)
